plot: A student and guest are late for a Children's Day performance but the backstage director and stage monitor keep the entertainment going until they arrive and the guest can explain the reason for the delay.
title: Hua er duo duo
plot_es: A student and guest are late for a Children's Day performance but the backstage director and stage monitor keep the entertainment going until they arrive and the guest can explain the reason for the delay.
plot_en: A student and guest are late for a Children's Day performance but the backstage director and stage monitor keep the entertainment going until they arrive and the guest can explain the reason for the delay.
